DataElement.preferredName: Functional Oral Intake Scale Level Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An observation of the level of oral intake abilities using the functional oral intake scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A measure to assess functional oral intake of food and liquids in patients with oropharyngeal dysphagia.:A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A measure to assess functional oral intake of food and liquids in patients with oropharyngeal dysphagia.

Concepts.definition: A measure to assess functional oral intake of food and liquids in patients with oropharyngeal dysphagia.

Property.preferredDefinition: A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.  (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes: 2023.11.29 Created per ticket request CADSR0003038. ak

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A measure to assess functional oral intake of food and liquids in patients with oropharyngeal dysphagia._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual is unable to take any foods or liquids by mouth.

Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual is unable to take any foods or liquids by mouth.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Tube Dependent with Minimal Oral Intake
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual is tube dependent for all nutrition and hydration needs, with minimal attempts at oral intake.

Concepts.longName: Tube Dependent with Minimal Oral Intake
Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual is tube dependent for all nutrition and hydration needs, with minimal attempts at oral intake.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual is able to take their nutrition orally, but it must be of a single consistency.

Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual is able to take their nutrition orally, but it must be of a single consistency.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Oral Diet of Multiple Consistencies with Special Preparation or Compensation
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual has an oral diet of multiple consistencies that requires special preparation or compensation.

Concepts.longName: Oral Diet of Multiple Consistencies with Special Preparation or Compensation
Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual has an oral diet of multiple consistencies that requires special preparation or compensation.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Oral Diet of Multiple Consistencies with Specific Preparation
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual has an oral diet of multiple consistencies that requires specific food preparation.

Concepts.longName: Oral Diet of Multiple Consistencies with Specific Preparation
Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual has an oral diet of multiple consistencies that requires specific food preparation.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual is able to eat a total oral diet with no restrictions.

Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual is able to eat a total oral diet with no restrictions.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Tube Dependent with Consistent Oral Intake
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual is tube dependent for all nutrition and hydration needs, but with consistent oral intake of food and/or fluid.

Concepts.longName: Tube Dependent with Consistent Oral Intake
Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual is tube dependent for all nutrition and hydration needs, but with consistent oral intake of food and/or fluid.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A measure to assess functional oral intake of food and liquids in patients with oropharyngeal dysphagia._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A measure to assess functional oral intake of food and liquids in patients with oropharyngeal dysphagia.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
